name: Edge Fault
description:
After the last invasion of monsters, the king decided it was up to you to defeat the waves of incoming monsters to keep the town alive.

The game lacks of gameplay and menus, also there is no sound. So far you can walk and fight with the default scorpion. If you get hit 4 times you are dead, but if you manage to hit the scorpion a dozen times, you will defeat him.

Controls:

WASD/left joystick: Move

Left mouse/B: Attack

Space/A: Jump

Escape/Start: Quit
